  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2905</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Solidarity with the USA</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Solidarität mit den USA</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Solidarité avec les Etats-Unis</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Solidarity com os EUA</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Solidarietà con gli S.U.A.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αλληλεγγύη με τις ΗΠΑ</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Solidaridad con los E.E.U.U.</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An interactive online unit which expresses solidarity with the USA in the wake of the september 11 tragedy.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">online unit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">tragedy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">terrorism</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">USA</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine interaktive Onlinemaßeinheit, die 
solidarität mit den USA unmittelbar nach der September 11 Tragödie 
ausdrückt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une unité en ligne interactive qui exprime la 
solidarité avec les Etats-Unis à la suite de la tragédie septembre 
de 11.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma unidade em linha interativa que expresse o 
solidarity com os EUA na vigília da tragédia setembro de 11.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un'unità in linea interattiva che esprime la 
solidarietà con gli S.U.A. come conseguenza del 11 della tragedia 
settembre.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια διαλογική σε απευθείας σύνδεση μονάδα που 
εκφράζει την αλληλεγγύη με τις ΗΠΑ αμέσως μετά τις 11 
Σεπτεμβρίου τραγωδία.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una unidad en línea interactiva que expresa 
solidaridad con los E.E.U.U. en la estela de la tragedia de septiembre
del 11.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Onlinemaßeinheit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Tragödie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Terrorismus</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">USA</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
